originalText.text: I recently hired this service for polished concrete and terrazzo polishing, and I couldn't be more impressed!! The attention to detail was exceptional, resulting in floors that exceeded my expectations. The team's professionalism and expertise shone through, making the entire process seamless. I highly recommend their services for anyone seeking top-notch concrete and terrazzo polishing. A truly fantastic experience!

originalText.text: Polished Concrete did an outstanding job with our commercial kitchen floor. They showed up as agreed and stuck to their timeline. We will definitely use them again when we're ready to do the rest of the facility. Price was reasonable, service was professional, and communication was excellent. I highly recommend.

We will definitely use them again when we're ready to do the rest of the facility. Price was reasonable, service was professional, and communication was excellent. I highly recommend.

originalText.text: I had you install polished concrete floors at our home in Alexandria Virginia upon your assurance that such floors are not simply for commercial use as I had previously thought. Turns out you were right! Not only is it easy to clean, but the polish also doesn’t seem to require that much work to maintain. I’m so impressed I might have these installed at my office building as well!
